txt.en: 'We've fought for our claim here, fought the Dourhands, and fought the wilds... no one can take this from us.'
'With pick-axe and sweat, we will uncover the treasures this hill hides.'
'It is for the love of the work, not the glory, that a dwarf-miner plies his trade.'
'In the dark of the tunnels... that's where a proper dwarf feels most at home.'
